components/products/card-regular:
{{#if demo}} {{name}} {{else}} {{name}} {{/if}}

{{#or customer (if theme_settings.restrict_to_login '!==' true)}} {{> components/products/price price=price}} {{else}} {{> components/common/login-for-pricing}} {{/or}}
components/products/carousel:
{{#each products}}
{{> components/products/card-regular settings=../settings theme_settings=../theme_settings customer=../customer event="list" position=(add @index 1)}}
{{/each}}
components/products/new:
{{lang 'products.new' }}

{{#if settings.data_tag_enabled}} {{> components/products/carousel products=products list="New Products"}} {{else}} {{> components/products/carousel products=products}} {{/if}}
